derivation.yuyuan_name: early 18th cent.: from French, from Italian pistone, variant of pestone 'large pestle', augmentative of pestello 'pestle'

entry.def: A piston is a cylinder or metal disc that is part of an engine. Pistons slide up and down inside tubes and cause various parts of the engine to move.

means.word_mean: 1. mechanical device that has a plunging or thrusting motion
